description: Use this action to retrieves information about a specific resource snapshot job.

parameters.name: Catalog
parameters.description: Specifies the catalog related to the request. Valid values are: AWS: Retrieves the snapshot job from the production AWS environment. Sandbox: Retrieves the snapshot job from a sandbox environment used for testing or development purposes.

parameters.name: ResourceSnapshotJobIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the resource snapshot job to be retrieved. This identifier is crucial for pinpointing the specific job you want to query.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the snapshot job. This globally unique identifier can be used for resource-specific operations across AWS services.

nested_items.name: Catalog
nested_items.description: The catalog in which the snapshot job was created. This will match the Catalog specified in the request.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the snapshot job was created in ISO 8601 format (UTC). Example: '2023-05-01T20:37:46Z'

nested_items.name: EngagementId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the engagement associated with this snapshot job. This links the job to a specific engagement context.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the snapshot job. This matches the ResourceSnapshotJobIdentifier provided in the request.

nested_items.name: LastFailure
nested_items.description: If the job has encountered any failures, this field contains the error message from the most recent failure. This can be useful for troubleshooting issues with the job.

nested_items.name: LastSuccessfulExecutionDate
nested_items.description: The date and time of the last successful execution of the job, in ISO 8601 format (UTC). Example: '2023-05-01T20:37:46Z'

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource being snapshotted. This provides a globally unique identifier for the resource across AWS.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the specific resource being snapshotted. The format might vary depending on the ResourceType.

nested_items.name: ResourceSnapshotTemplateName
nested_items.description: The name of the template used for creating the snapshot. This is the same as the template name. It defines the structure and content of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of resource being snapshotted. This would have 'Opportunity' as a value as it is dependent on the supported resource type.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the snapshot job. Valid values:
STOPPED: The job is not currently running.
RUNNING: The job is actively executing.
